body.p: The publishing Connectors page allows you to create and configure connectors. A Content Fusion connector is associated with a deliverable, enabling the publishing for the deliverable's build outputs through the configured connector. Content Fusion offers support for the following connector types:

To create a new connector, click the New Connector button located in the top-right corner of the page. Then, select the desired connector type and fill in the necessary fields corresponding to the chosen connector type in the resulting dialog box.
For existing connectors, you can click the ellipsis (3 vertical dots) to the right of the particular connector to reveal actions to View deliverables for the connector, Edit it, or Delete it.
